name: Osmosis (Cookie Box Games)
description:
Global Game Jam 2023 Submission

Can you get all the water drops to the top of the tree?

Osmosis is a small 2.5D retro-styled platformer where you control a bunch of water droplets, and attempt to lead them from the roots to the top of a tree in order to make it bloom!

Cell Walls will prevent all the droplets from getting through, so think strategically about how you manoeuvre them. The more water you get to the top of the tree, the bigger the fruit grows!

Diversifiers Used:

Zen

An Image Is Worth 1000 Words

Creature Feature

The World Is A Better Place With More Creators In It

Is This The End?

Credits Programming: Miguel Palma & Kirk Tiller 3D Modelling & Animation: Kirk Tiller Art: Riley Anderson Game Design: Tristan Atkinson Music & Sound: Aimee-Louise Saunders (with help from Miguel Palma)
